queries.query:
from(bucket: "manufacturing")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "assemblyline")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "plant_details_location")

from(bucket: "manufacturing")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "assemblyline")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "cars_produced_0_model")

from(bucket: "manufacturing")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "assemblyline")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "cars_produced_0_engine_type")

from(bucket: "manufacturing")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "assemblyline")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "cars_produced_0_assembly_status")

from(bucket: "manufacturing")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "assemblyline")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "performance_metrics_availability_oee")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "manufacturing")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "assemblyline")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "performance_metrics_comments")

from(bucket: "manufacturing")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "assemblyline")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "shift")

from(bucket: "manufacturing")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "assemblyline")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "plant_details_location" or r["_field"] == "employees_on_shift_0_name")

from(bucket: "manufacturing")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "assemblyline")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "employees_on_shift_2_name")

from(bucket: "manufacturing")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "assemblyline")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "actual_production_actual_production_time_hours")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "manufacturing")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "assemblyline")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "equipment_telemetry_0_equipment_id")

from(bucket: "manufacturing")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "assemblyline")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "equipment_telemetry_0_cycles_completed")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "manufacturing")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "assemblyline")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "equipment_telemetry_0_efficiency")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "manufacturing")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "assemblyline")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "equipment_telemetry_4_failures_last_month")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "manufacturing")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "assemblyline")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "equipment_telemetry_0_type")

from(bucket: "manufacturing")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "assemblyline")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "equipment_telemetry_0_maintenance_alert")

from(bucket: "manufacturing")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "assemblyline")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "equipment_telemetry_0_last_maintenance")

from(bucket: "manufacturing")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "assemblyline")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "equipment_telemetry_0_next_scheduled_maintenance")
